ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T13:49:54 [Issue ID 4000-16688] urn:comicvine:4000-16688 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 11:56:14. [Issue ID 30216]
ComicInfo.Title: Tinhorn Sheriff!; Gun-Play; Fateful Journey!; Phantom Ambush!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Tinhorn Sheriff!: Colt helps Crandall clean up Copperhead and gets the newspaper printing again.
Gun-Play: Weems challenges Colt to a shoot-out, not knowing who he is. Colt easily bests him.
Fateful Journey!: Colt is captured and held by a sheriff aboard a stage alongside Whitney. When the stage is attacked, Whitney sets Colt free to help drive off the thieves. Colt is proved innocent for the time and Whitney gives him two colts from the Colt Company.
Phantom Ambush!: Drakul turns against Wolf Sabine and informs Colt about Sabine's plan to steal gold hidden in a Mandan burial site. Colt thwarts Sabine's gang with Drakul's help.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
